column1: Little Goat Diner////The food here does not disappoint. The service however needs more. We waited over 15 minutes before even being greeted and offered water. That should be immediate after being sat. Yes
column3: reservations are a must... But for being that busy the crew should be moving. All the servers just seemed to mosey around
column4: while bus boys ran. Get it together! You are a server
column5: you should be running around at a fast pace! Plus
column6: the attitude could go. Good food
